modShortDescription: Megaforce energy drink is fresh and nutritious drink which gives 50% stamina gain, 20 seconds more run power and 70 water. It is great in all ways.
modDescription:
Can be looted, medium rarity, shares loot table with other drinks.

Can be crafted with acid and murky [water](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-drinks/).

Megaforce energy drink is fresh and nutritious drink which gives 50% stamina gain, 20 seconds more run power and 70 water. It is great in all ways.

**[Download](https://github.com/mipastu/megaforce7d2d/archive/refs/heads/main.zip)**

**Credits:** [Mipastu](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/mipastu/)
